# CloudWay 24 | Armed Forces Discount Program

CloudWay 24 salutes the service and sacrifice of the armed forces. As part of our commitment to giving back, we offer exclusive discounts for both **serving and retired members** of the Indian Armed Forces when flying with CloudWay 24.

---

## ðŸŒŸ Whatâ€™s Included?

- **Flat 15% Discount** on base airfare for all eligible serving and retired armed forces personnel.
- Applicable for **CloudSaver (Economy)**, **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)**, and **CloudElite (Business Class)** fares on all domestic and international CloudWay 24-operated flights.
- **Complimentary Additional 10kg Baggage Allowance** on all tickets booked under this scheme.
- **Priority Check-in** and **Boarding Privileges** at all major hubs.

---

## ðŸ‘©â€âœˆï¸ Who is Eligible?

- **Serving Personnel** of the Indian Army, Navy, Air Force, Coast Guard, and Paramilitary Forces.
- **Retired/ Ex-Servicemen** of the above services.
- **Immediate Family Members**(spouse and dependent children) when traveling with the eligible personnel.

---

## ðŸ“ How to Avail:

1. **Sign Up / Login** with your email or mobile on [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com) or the CloudWay24 App (iOS/Android).
2. **Select â€œPlan My Flightâ€** and enter your round trip or one-way details.
3. **On the passenger details page**, choose â€œArmed Forces Discountâ€ and upload valid service/retirement ID proof.
4. **Proceed to payment** â€” discounted fare and baggage benefits will be automatically applied.
5. **Complete booking** using credit/debit card, netbanking, or SkyPoints 24 points.

---

## ðŸ“„ Acceptable ID Proofs

- Government-issued Armed Forces Service Card (for serving personnel)
- Pension Payment Order/ Ex-Serviceman Identity Card/ Retirement Card (for retired personnel)
- Dependent ID Card (for family members)

---

## Terms & Conditions

- The armed forces discount is subject to seat availability under the applicable fare class.
- Discount is applicable **only on base fare**, not including taxes, surcharges or add-ons.
- Not combinable with other promotional offers.
- Valid ID proof must be carried and shown at check-in/counters.
- CloudWay 24 reserves the right to withdraw or modify the offer at any time.

---

**Seamless Skies, Global Reach.**
_Discover the world with respectâ€”and savings._

markdown_content:
# Cancel Your Booking with CloudWay 24

CloudWay 24 aims to provide passengers with flexibility and control over their travel plans. If you need to cancel your booking for any reason, our streamlined process ensures a hassle-free experience both online and via our mobile app.

---

##  How to Cancel Your Booking

You can cancel your booking in two convenient ways:

### 1. **Website**
- Visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com).
- Sign in with your email or mobile number.
- Navigate to **Manage My Flight**.
- Select **Cancel Your Booking**.
- Enter your booking details (Booking reference and Last name).
- Review your booking details and click **Proceed to Cancel**.
- Confirm your choice. If eligible, your refund amount and policy will be displayed.
- Submit the cancellation request.

### 2. **CloudWay 24 Mobile App (iOS/Android)**
- Open the CloudWay 24 app.
- Log in to your account.
- Go to **Manage My Flight**.
- Tap on **Cancel Your Booking**.
- Select your trip or enter your booking reference.
- Review your booking details and click **Proceed to Cancel**.
- Confirm your choice. If eligible, your refund amount and policy will be displayed.
- Submit the cancellation request.

---

## Refund & Cancellation Policy

- **Refund eligibility:** Depends on fare type, class of travel, and time of cancellation.
- **Flexible tickets:** Eligible for full or partial refund, as per fare conditions.
- **Promotional or non-refundable fares:** Generally non-refundable except for taxes, as per policy.
- **Refund method:** Processed to the original payment method (credit/debit card, netbanking, or SkyPoints 24 points).
- **Processing time:** Refunds are typically processed within 7â€“10 business days.

### Note:
- Cancellation fees may apply based on fare class and timing.
- No-shows or last-minute cancellations may receive reduced refunds.
- For third-party/travel agent bookings, please contact the respective agent for cancellation.

---

## Need Assistance?

- **CloudWay 24 Customer Care:** Available 24/7 via website chat, app support, or helpline.
- For more information, visit our [FAQs](https://cloudway24.com/faq).

---

> Fly Seamless. Fly CloudWay 24.

markdown_content:
# Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia
_A comprehensive guide for CloudWay 24 travelers_

---

## General Guidelines

- **Passport Validity:**  
  Most Asian countries require a passport with at least 6 monthsâ€™ validity from the date of entry.
- **Blank Pages:**  
  At least 2 blank pages are usually recommended for entry/exit stamps and visas.
- **Return/Onward Ticket:**  
  Proof of onward or return travel is often required.
- **Travel Insurance:**  
  Strongly recommended; mandatory for some destinations.

---

## Popular Asian Destinations: Visa Policy Overview

### 1. Singapore
- **Visa-Free:**  Indian citizens (up to 30 days for select categories, mostly require e-visa prior to travel)
- **E-Visa:**  Required for Indian passport holders (Apply before travel)
- **On Arrival:**  Not available
- **Documents:**  Proof of funds, return ticket, hotel booking

---

### 2. Thailand
- **Visa-On-Arrival:** For Indian citizens (up to 15 days, fee payable, limited entry points)
- **E-Visa:** Option available
- **Requirements:**  Proof of accommodation, funds, return ticket

---

### 3. Japan
- **Visa Required:** All Indian citizens must obtain a visa in advance from the Japanese embassy/consulate
- **Documents:**  Invitation letter/travel itinerary, bank statement, return ticket

---

### 4. Malaysia
- **E-Visa:** Available for Indian tourists (Apply online prior to travel, valid for 30 days)
- **Visa-On-Arrival:** Possible when arriving from Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia, or Brunei (conditions apply)
- **Requirements:** Proof of funds, return/onward ticket, hotel booking

---

### 5. United Arab Emirates (Dubai)
- **E-Visa:** Required for Indian passport holders (Apply online, typically via airline or sponsor)
- **Visa-on-arrival:** For Indian passport holders with US Green Card/UK/EU Residence Permit (14 days)
- **Documents:** Return ticket, hotel booking

---

### 6. Indonesia (Bali/Jakarta)
- **Visa-on-arrival:** Indian citizens eligible (USD fee, valid for 30 days, extendable)
- **E-Visa:** Pre-application possible
- **Requirements:** Return flight, hotel booking

---

### 7. Nepal
- **Visa-Free:** For Indian citizens (no visa required, must carry valid passport/election ID)
- **Entry Points:** Airports and designated land borders

---

### 8. Bangladesh
- **Visa Required:** Indian citizens need a visa; advance application required
- **Documents:** Travel itinerary, invitation (as applicable), hotel booking

---

### 9. Hong Kong (SAR)
- **Pre-arrival Online Registration:** Mandatory for Indian citizens (up to 14 days stay)
- **Visa Required:** For stays longer than 14 days, work, or study

---

### 10. China
- **Visa Required:** Indian passport holders must obtain a visa prior to travel
- **Application:** At designated Visa Application Centres
- **Documents:** Detailed itinerary, hotel booking, financial proof

---

## Important Notes

- **Visa and entry requirements can change without notice.**  
  Always confirm the latest requirements from official government sources or the respective country's embassy/consulate before booking.
- **CloudWay 24 does not guarantee travel or immigration approval.**  
  Passengers are responsible for securing valid travel documents.

---

**For detailed assistance, visit our website [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or get in touch with our customer support.**

Important Notes

# Airbus A380: Overview & Cabin Features

## Aircraft Overview: Airbus A380

The **Airbus A380** is the worldâ€™s largest passenger airliner, renowned for its double-deck, wide-body design, offering unmatched space, comfort, and quietness in long-haul travel. With its advanced aerodynamics and efficient engines, the A380 is a flagship for many leading airlines, optimizing both capacity and passenger experience.

---

## Seating Capacity

- **Total Seating:** *Typically 500â€“575 passengers* (can be configured for up to 853 in all-economy layout)
- **Decks:** Double-deck (Main and Upper)
- **Class Configuration (typical 4-class layout):**
    - First Class: 8â€“14 seats
    - Business Class: 70â€“100 seats
    - Premium Economy: 50â€“55 seats
    - Economy Class: 350â€“450 seats

---

## Cabin Features by Class

### 1. **First Class (CloudLux)**
- **Seating:** Fully flat suites with privacy doors (1-2-1 configuration)
- **Features:**
    - Personal suite with lie-flat bed
    - Direct aisle access
    - Luxury amenity kits & designer bedding
    - Personal wardrobe storage
    - Private minibar
    - In-seat power and USB charging
    - 32-40â€ HD inflight entertainment screens
    - Access to onboard lounge/bar (select airlines)
    - Fine-dining menus, served on demand

---

### 2. **Business Class (CloudElite)**
- **Seating:** Lie-flat seats, staggered or herringbone layout (1-2-1 or 2-2-2)
- **Features:**
    - 180Â° lie-flat seats with direct aisle access
    - Plush bedding and privacy dividers
    - On-demand gourmet dining
    - 18-24â€ personal entertainment screens
    - Ample storage & power outlets
    - Enhanced amenity kits
    - Access to onboard lounge (on select aircraft)

---

### 3. **Premium Economy (CloudComfort)**
- **Seating:** Wider seats, extra legroom (2-3-2 or 2-4-2)
- **Features:**
    - Up to 38â€ seat pitch, 19â€“20â€ width
    - Deeper seat recline and adjustable footrests
    - Enhanced meal service & welcome drinks
    - 13â€“15â€ personal screens
    - Dedicated cabin and lavatories
    - Extra luggage allowance

---

### 4. **Economy Class (CloudSaver)**
- **Seating:** Standard seats (3-4-3 on main deck; 2-4-2 on upper deck, select rows)
- **Features:**
    - Seat pitch: 31â€“33â€, width: 18â€“18.5â€
    - Adjustable headrests
    - Personal 10â€“13â€ HD screens
    - Hundreds of movies, music, games
    - Complimentary meals and beverages
    - Family and bassinet seating options
    - Power outlets on select fleets

---

## Additional A380 Features

- **Spacious cabins with reduced noise levels**
- **Mood lighting for reduced jetlag**
- **Wide aisles and larger lavatories**
- **Onboard bars/lounges for premium cabins (some airlines)**
- **Advanced air filtration and humidity control**
- **Wheelchair-accessible lavatories**

---

> **Note:** Seating configuration and amenities may vary by airline.

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 Baggage Allowance Policy

CloudWay 24 offers generous and convenient baggage allowances tailored to each cabin class, ensuring a comfortable and seamless journey for all passengers.

---

## Cabin Baggage Allowance

| Class          | Number of Bags | Max Weight (per bag) | Maximum Dimensions (L x W x H) |
| -------------- | -------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| **CloudLux (First)**         | 2                | 10 kg each            | 55 x 40 x 23 cm                |
| **CloudElite (Business)**    | 2                | 8 kg each             | 55 x 40 x 23 cm                |
| **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)** | 1           | 8 kg                  | 55 x 40 x 23 cm                |
| **CloudSaver (Economy)**     | 1                | 7 kg                  | 55 x 40 x 23 cm                |

> *In addition: 1 small personal item (laptop bag/handbag) per passenger is permitted.*

---

## Checked Baggage Allowance

| Class          | Number of Bags | Max Weight (per bag) | Total Allowance |
| -------------- | -------------- | -------------------- | --------------- |
| **CloudLux (First)**         | 3                | 32 kg                | 96 kg           |
| **CloudElite (Business)**    | 2                | 32 kg                | 64 kg           |
| **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)** | 2           | 23 kg                | 46 kg           |
| **CloudSaver (Economy)**     | 1                | 23 kg                | 23 kg           |

> *Bags exceeding 158 cm (62 in) in total dimensions (L+W+H) or the permitted weight may incur excess baggage fees.*

---

## Excess Baggage Policy

- **Excess Baggage**: Can be pre-purchased at a discounted rate via the CloudWay24 app or website during booking or under "Manage My Flight."
- **At Airport**: Higher fees apply for additional or overweight baggage checked at the airport counter.
- **SkyPoints 24 Members**: Elite tier members may enjoy additional free allowanceâ€”check your SkyPoints 24 tier benefits.

---

## Special Baggage

- Sporting equipment and musical instruments accepted as part of checked baggage allowance; items exceeding size/weight limits may attract charges.
- Contact customer service for special arrangements or detailed advice.

---

## Important Guidelines

- All baggage must be properly labeled with your name and contact information.
- Carry-on luggage must fit in the overhead bin or under the seat.
- Dangerous or prohibited items not allowed.

For the most up-to-date baggage rules and detailed FAQs, visit [CloudWay24.com/Baggage](https://CloudWay24.com/Baggage) or check the "Baggage Policy" section in the CloudWay24 app.

---
*Travel smooth. Travel CloudWay 24 â€“ Seamless Skies, Global Reach.*

> *In addition: 1 small personal item (laptop bag/handbag) per passenger is permitted.*

Block 2: CloudWay 24 Baggage Allowance Policy > Checked Baggage Allowance
| Class          | Number of Bags | Max Weight (per bag) | Total Allowance |
| -------------- | -------------- | -------------------- | --------------- |
| **CloudLux (First)**         | 3                | 32 kg                | 96 kg           |
| **CloudElite (Business)**    | 2                | 32 kg                | 64 kg           |
| **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)** | 2           | 23 kg                | 46 kg           |
| **CloudSaver (Economy)**     | 1                | 23 kg                | 23 kg           |
> *Bags exceeding 158 cm (62 in) in total dimensions (L+W+H) or the permitted weight may incur excess baggage fees.*

Block 3: CloudWay 24 Baggage Allowance Policy > Excess Baggage Policy
- **Excess Baggage**: Can be pre-purchased at a discounted rate via the CloudWay24 app or website during booking or under "Manage My Flight."
- **At Airport**: Higher fees apply for additional or overweight baggage checked at the airport counter.
- **SkyPoints 24 Members**: Elite tier members may enjoy additional free allowanceâ€”check your SkyPoints 24 tier benefits.

Block 4: CloudWay 24 Baggage Allowance Policy > Special Baggage
- Sporting equipment and musical instruments accepted as part of checked baggage allowance; items exceeding size/weight limits may attract charges.
- Contact customer service for special arrangements or detailed advice.

Block 5: CloudWay 24 Baggage Allowance Policy > Important Guidelines
- All baggage must be properly labeled with your name and contact information.
- Carry-on luggage must fit in the overhead bin or under the seat.
- Dangerous or prohibited items not allowed.

markdown_content:
# Delayed Baggage â€“ CloudWay 24

Traveling with CloudWay 24 should always be seamless, but in rare cases, your checked baggage may be delayed. Hereâ€™s what you need to know and how we support you through the process.

---

## What To Do If Your Bag Is Delayed

1. **Report Immediately**
   - Upon arrival, proceed to the CloudWay 24 Baggage Services Desk in the arrivals area **before exiting the airport**.
   - Provide your baggage claim tag and boarding pass.

2. **File a Report**
   - Fill out the *Property Irregularity Report (PIR)* with our baggage staff.
   - Note your local contact details and delivery address.

3. **Track Your Baggage**
   - Use the tracking reference number given on your PIR.
   - Visit [CloudWay24.com/baggage-tracking](https://CloudWay24.com/baggage-tracking) or track via the **CloudWay24 app**.

---

## While You Wait

- **Essentials Kit:** Eligible passengers may receive an amenity kit with basic toiletries.
- **Expense Reimbursement:** Reimbursement may be provided (subject to policy and ticket class) for essential items purchased due to delayed baggage. Save all receipts.

---

## Baggage Delivery

- Once your baggage arrives, CloudWay 24 will arrange free delivery to your local address listed in the PIR report.
- Our team will keep you updated via SMS, email, or calls.

---

## Compensation & Claims

- If your bag is not located within 21 days, it may be treated as lost and compensation claims can be initiated as per our policy and international regulations (e.g., Montreal Convention).
- Submit claims on our website or through customer service.

---

## Contacts & Support

- **CloudWay 24 Baggage Helpline:** [Customer Support Page](https://CloudWay24.com/contact)  
- **App:** Go to *Manage My Flight* > *Baggage Assistance*
- **Email:** baggage@cloudway24.com

---

## Important Tips

- Always label your checked bags with your name and contact details.
- Keep your baggage tags and boarding passes until you collect your luggage.
- Pack essential medication and valuables in your carry-on.

---

For more details, visit: [CloudWay24.com/baggage](https://CloudWay24.com/baggage)

*Thank you for choosing CloudWay 24. Weâ€™re committed to resolving your baggage concerns as quickly as possible!*

markdown_content:
# Web Check-In Guide â€“ CloudWay 24

Web check-in with CloudWay 24 is an easy and convenient way to confirm your travel, choose your seat, and save valuable time at the airport. Hereâ€™s everything you need to know:

---

## What is Web Check-In?

Web check-in allows you to check-in for your CloudWay 24 flight online via the website or mobile app before arriving at the airport. You can:

- Select/modify your seat
- Download/print your boarding pass
- Add frequent flyer details
- Save time and avoid airport queues

---

## When Can I Check-In Online?

- **Opens:** 48 hours before scheduled departure
- **Closes:** 2 hours before the flight departure

---

## How to Web Check-In with CloudWay 24

### **Step 1: Access Web Check-In**
- Visit [CloudWay24.com](https://www.cloudway24.com) OR open the CloudWay24 mobile app  
- Go to: **Manage My Flight â†’ Web Check-In**

### **Step 2: Enter Your Details**
- Provide your:
  - Booking Reference (PNR)
  - Last Name or Registered Mobile/Email

### **Step 3: Select Passengers**
- Choose the passenger(s) you wish to check-in from your booking.

### **Step 4: Choose Your Seat**
- View seat map and:
  - Select or upgrade your seat (upgrade charges apply for premium cabins)
  - Confirm seat selection

### **Step 5: Add Extras (Optional)**
- Indicate meal preferences
- Add or update frequent flyer details
- Request special assistance

### **Step 6: Confirm & Get Boarding Pass**
- Confirm your check-in details
- Receive your boarding pass:
  - Download as PDF
  - Get a mobile e-boarding pass
  - Option to have it emailed

---

## Baggage Drop at the Airport

- **Already checked-in online?**  
  Drop off check-in bags at the **CloudWay 24 Baggage Drop Counter** at least 60 minutes before departure.

- **Traveling with only cabin baggage?**  
  Proceed directly to security with your e-boarding pass and valid ID.

---

## Important Notes

- Web check-in may not be available for:
  - Passengers needing special assistance (medical, minors traveling alone, etc.)
  - Certain international flights due to security regulations
- Valid photo identification is mandatory at the airport, along with your boarding pass.
- If you have upgraded or changed your booking after check-in, re-issue your boarding pass.

---

## Need Help?

- Visit [CloudWay24.com/support](https://www.cloudway24.com/support)
- Contact the 24x7 CloudWay 24 Customer Care

---

Fly smart. Fly CloudWay 24 â€“ *Seamless Skies, Global Reach.*

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 Lounge Access Guide

CloudWay 24 offers exclusive lounge access for our premium guests, ensuring a comfortable and luxurious pre-flight experience at our main hubs and select international airports. Lounge access is designed to match the level of cabin class you travel in, offering everything from gourmet dining and private workspaces to shower facilities and entertainment.

---

## Lounge Access by Cabin Class

### 1. **CloudLux (First Class)**
- **Access:** Complimentary
- **Guest Policy:** 1 complimentary guest
- **Lounge Features:**
  - Private suites
  - Ã€ la carte gourmet dining
  - Premium beverages & barista service
  - Spa and shower facilities
  - Private meeting rooms
  - High-speed Wi-Fi
  - Entertainment lounge

---

### 2. **CloudElite (Business Class)**
- **Access:** Complimentary
- **Guest Policy:** No guest (unless SkyPoints 24 Elite status)
- **Lounge Features:**
  - Buffet dining & snacks
  - Full-service bar
  - Shower facilities
  - Quiet zones for relaxation
  - Business center & work pods
  - High-speed Wi-Fi

---

### 3. **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)**
- **Access:** Paid Access or Complimentary for SkyPoints 24 Gold & higher tiers
- **Paid Access:** Available at select airports, subject to capacity
- **Lounge Features:**
  - Light refreshments & snacks
  - Beverages (non-alcoholic + select alcoholic)
  - Wi-Fi & charging stations
  - Lounging area with newspapers and magazines

---

### 4. **CloudSaver (Economy)**
- **Access:** Not included
- **Eligibility:**
  - Available for purchase (subject to availability)
  - Complimentary for SkyPoints 24 Platinum members

---

## How to Access

- Present valid same-day CloudWay 24 boarding pass for international flights at entrance.
- SkyPoints 24 Elite/Gold/Platinum members must present member card (digital/physical).

---

## Location

- Lounges available at:
  - Mumbai (Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport)
  - Delhi (Indira Gandhi International Airport)
  - Bengaluru (Kempegowda International Airport)
  - Select international partner lounges worldwide

---

## Further Details

- For real-time lounge eligibility, guest policy, and access charges, check â€œLounge Accessâ€ in the **CloudWay24 App** or visit [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com).
- Lounge access policy may vary by airport and is subject to availability.

---

*Experience seamless comfort even before you fly with CloudWay 24 lounges.*

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24: Employee Insurance Policy Overview

CloudWay 24 provides comprehensive group insurance coverage for all employees, ensuring their health, safety, and well-being while on duty and beyond. Insurance benefits are categorized based on employee roles due to the varying risk profiles associated with their responsibilities.

## Insurance Policy Categories

### 1. Non-Ground Staff
**(Pilots & Cabin Crew)**

- **Nature of Coverage:**  
  Enhanced coverage due to higher occupational risk (airborne duties, international layovers, irregular schedules).

- **Policy Limit Highlights:**
    - **Group Life Insurance:** INR 1.5 Crore (approx. $180,000)
    - **Accidental Death & Disability:** INR 2 Crore (approx. $240,000)
    - **Medical Insurance (per annum):** INR 10 Lakh (~$12,000)
    - **Critical Illness Cover:** INR 20 Lakh (~$24,000)
    - **Loss of License Benefit:** Applicable to Pilots (up to INR 1 Crore/$120,000 for loss of medical certification)
    - **Travel Insurance:** Comprehensive, global coverage included

---

### 2. Ground Staff
**(Engineering, HR, Administration, Support Services, and Other Employees)**

- **Nature of Coverage:**  
  Standard coverage reflecting relatively lower occupational exposure.

- **Policy Limit Highlights:**
    - **Group Life Insurance:** INR 50 Lakh (approx. $60,000)
    - **Accidental Death & Disability:** INR 75 Lakh (approx. $90,000)
    - **Medical Insurance (per annum):** INR 5 Lakh (~$6,000)
    - **Critical Illness Cover:** INR 10 Lakh (~$12,000)
    - **Loss of License Benefit:** Not Applicable
    - **Travel Insurance:** Domestic and limited international work travel coverage

---

## Additional Notes

- **Family Coverage:**  
  Medical insurance can be extended to spouse and dependent children at preferential group rates.

- **Claim Settlement:**  
  All claims are facilitated by the Corporate HR and Employee Well-being Department in partnership with leading insurance providers.

- **Review & Update:**  
  Insurance limits and coverage are reviewed annually as per regulatory standards and operational requirements.

---

## Summary Table

| Category                       | Life Insurance | Accidental Death & Disability | Medical Insurance (per annum) | Critical Illness | Loss of License | Travel Insurance        |
|------------------------------- |---------------|-------------------------------|-------------------------------|------------------|-----------------|------------------------|
| Pilots & Cabin Crew            | INR 1.5 Crore | INR 2 Crore                   | INR 10 Lakh                   | INR 20 Lakh      | Up to INR 1 Crore| Global, Comprehensive  |
| Ground Staff (Engineering, HR) | INR 50 Lakh   | INR 75 Lakh                   | INR 5 Lakh                    | INR 10 Lakh      | Not Applicable  | Domestic / Limited Int.|

---

For latest updates or claims, log in to the CloudWay 24 Employee Portal or contact HR at **hr@cloudway24.com**.

markdown_content:
# Modify Trip Dates with CloudWay 24

CloudWay 24 understands that plans can change. If you need to modify your trip dates after booking your ticket, the process is simple and can be done conveniently through the CloudWay 24 website or mobile app.

---

##  Steps to Modify Your Trip Dates

### 1. Log In

- Visit [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com) or open the **CloudWay 24** app.
- Log in using your email or mobile number and password.

### 2. Access "Manage My Flight"

- Navigate to the **"Manage My Flight"** section from the homepage or main menu.

### 3. Retrieve Your Booking

- Enter your booking reference number (PNR) and last name, or log in to view your bookings.
- Select the booking you wish to modify.

### 4. Select "Modify Your Booking"

- Click on the **"Modify Your Booking"** option.
- Choose **"Change Trip Dates"** from the available modification options.

### 5. Choose New Dates

- Select your new preferred departure (and return, if applicable) dates.
- Review available flights and seat options for your new travel dates.

### 6. Review Changes

- Compare the current and new flight details.
- Any fare differences or change fees, according to your ticket rules, will be displayed.

### 7. Confirm and Pay

- Agree to any additional charges if applicable (fare difference/change fee).
- Choose your payment option (credit card, debit card, netbanking, or SkyPoints 24 points).
- Complete the payment.

### 8. Receive Confirmation

- You will receive a confirmation email and/or SMS with your updated travel itinerary.

---

## Notes & Policies

- **Change Fees:** Date changes may be subject to a change fee and/or fare difference depending on your fare type and class of travel.
- **Eligibility:** Some ticket types may have restrictions on date changes or may not be changeable.
- **Assistance:** For complex itineraries or group bookings, you may contact CloudWay 24 Customer Support.

---

##  Need Help?

- Visit the **Help Center** on [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com)
- Call Customer Support (contact info available on website)
- Reach us through the in-app chat for real-time assistance

---

**CloudWay 24** â€“ Seamless Skies, Global Reach.

markdown_content:
# Travelling with Pets on CloudWay 24

CloudWay 24 welcomes you and your furry companions aboard! To ensure a pleasant and safe journey for both you and your pet, please review our comprehensive guidelines for travelling with pets.

---

## General Policy

- **Eligible Pets:** Cats and small dogs (domesticated), in good health and at least 3 months old.
- **Allowed Routes:** Pets are permitted only on international flights operated exclusively by CloudWay 24.
- **Advance Booking:** Notify CloudWay 24 **at least 48 hours before departure** to reserve a spot for your pet.

---

## Pet Travel Options

| Option              | In-Cabin                 | Checked Baggage (Hold)         |
|---------------------|--------------------------|--------------------------------|
| Availability        | Select international routes (duration under 8 hours) | All direct international flights |
| Weight Limit        | **Up to 8 kg** (incl. carrier)   | Up to 32 kg (incl. carrier)    |
| Carrier Size (max)  | 43x33x20 cm              | 100x60x75 cm                   |
| Pet Fee             | USD 150 / INR 11,000     | USD 250 / INR 18,000           |

---

## Carrier Requirements

- **In-Cabin:** Soft-sided, leak-proof, well-ventilated carrier that fits under the seat.
- **Checked:** Rigid carrier with secure latch, absorbent bedding, and enough room for your pet to stand, turn, and lie down comfortably.
- Identification tag (with pet name and contact info).
- One carrier per passenger. Maximum 2 pets per booking (1 in-cabin, 1 in hold).

---

## Health & Documentation

- Valid **health certificate** from a licensed veterinarian issued within 10 days of departure.
- **Vaccination records** (including rabies certificate).
- **Import/export permits**, if required by destination country.

---

## Check-In & Boarding

- Arrive at least **2 hours before departure** for check-in.
- Use designated pet relief and holding areas (where available).
- In-cabin pets must remain in their carrier throughout the flightâ€”no exceptions.

---

## Restrictions

- No pets allowed in **CloudLux (First Class)** or on select aircraft types due to space limitations.
- **Brachycephalic breeds** (flat-faced dogs/cats) may not be allowed in the hold for safety reasons.
- Not permitted as cargo or unaccompanied (except registered service animalsâ€”see special needs policy).

---

## How to Book

1. **During flight booking:** Select "Travelling with Pets" and enter pet details.
2. **After booking:** Use "Manage My Flight" > "Add a Pet" option or contact Customer Care.
3. **Payment:** Pet travel fees must be paid online with Credit Card, Debit Card, Netbanking, or SkyPoints 24 points.

---

## Tips for a Smooth Journey

- Feed your pet a light meal 2 hours before departure.
- Avoid tranquilizing your pet unless prescribed by a vet.
- Place a familiar toy or blanket in the carrier for comfort.
- Attach a current photo of your pet to the carrier.

---

For more information, visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or contact our 24/7 Customer Support.

---
*CloudWay 24 â€“ Seamless Skies for You and Your Pet!*

2. **After booking:** Use "Manage My Flight" > "Add a Pet" option or contact Customer Care.
3. **Payment:** Pet travel fees must be paid online with Credit Card, Debit Card, Netbanking, or SkyPoints 24 points.

Block 8: Travelling with Pets on CloudWay 24 > Tips for a Smooth Journey
- Feed your pet a light meal 2 hours before departure.
- Avoid tranquilizing your pet unless prescribed by a vet.
- Place a familiar toy or blanket in the carrier for comfort.
- Attach a current photo of your pet to the carrier.

markdown_content:
# Damaged Baggage Policy â€“ CloudWay 24

---

## Overview
At CloudWay 24, we strive to ensure the safety and care of your baggage throughout your journey. However, in the rare event your baggage is damaged during transit, we are committed to addressing your concerns promptly and fairly.

---

## What Qualifies as Damaged Baggage?

Damaged baggage includes:
- Broken handles, wheels, or locks
- Tears, holes, or serious dents in the baggage structure
- Damaged zippers or missing straps
- Soiling, stains, or water damage caused by airline handling

**Not Covered:**  
- Minor scratches, scuffs, or dents consistent with normal handling
- Pre-existing damage or overpacked bags
- Accessories or items attached to baggage (e.g., removable straps, covers)

---

## Reporting Damaged Baggage

### At the Airport
1. **Report immediately** to the CloudWay 24 Baggage Service Desk before leaving the arrival hall.
2. Fill out the **Damaged Baggage Claim Form** with our representative.
3. Provide your **boarding pass**, **bag tags**, and a valid photo ID.

### After Leaving the Airport
- If you notice the damage after leaving, report it in writing within **7 days** of receiving your baggage.
- Email: `baggagesupport@cloudway24.com`  
- Include: Photos of the damage, baggage tag, travel details, and contact information.

---

## Our Compensation Policy

CloudWay 24 will:
- Evaluate the extent and cause of the damage.
- Offer a repair service, replacement bag, or financial compensation (as per international conventions and airline policy).
- Compensation may vary depending on the level of damage, bag age, and documentation provided.

**Note:**  
CloudWay 24â€™s liability for damaged baggage is limited as per the Montreal Convention and company policy.

---

## Exclusions

- Fragile, perishable, or valuable items packed in checked luggage
- Incorrectly packed or overstuffed baggage
- Minor cosmetic damages
- Delayed reporting (claims after 7 days of arrival)

---

## Contact & Support

- **Baggage Desk** at any CloudWay 24 arrival hall
- **Customer Support:**  
  - Email: `baggagesupport@cloudway24.com`  
  - Website: [CloudWay24.com/support](https://cloudway24.com/support)  
  - App: Use â€œManage My Flightâ€ > â€œReport Baggage Issueâ€

---

## Helpful Tips

- Keep your bag tags and receipts until the end of your journey.
- Inspect your baggage immediately upon collection.
- Use name labels on your baggage.

---

*For full terms and the latest updates, please refer to [CloudWay24.com/baggage-policy](https://cloudway24.com/baggage-policy) or check the CloudWay 24 App.*

markdown_content:
# How to Earn SkyPoints 24 with CloudWay 24

SkyPoints 24 is CloudWay 24â€™s exclusive frequent flyer program, designed to reward loyal travelers with points on every journey and offer exclusive benefits.

---

## Ways to Earn SkyPoints 24

### 1. **Flight Bookings**

- **Earn SkyPoints 24 every time you fly with CloudWay 24:**
    - Points are credited based on *distance flown*, *class of travel*, and *SkyPoints 24 tier*.
    - All cabin classes qualify:  
        - CloudLux (First Class) â€“ Highest points accrual  
        - CloudElite (Business Class)  
        - CloudComfort (Premium Economy)  
        - CloudSaver (Economy)

- **How points are calculated:**
    - *Base Points* per mile/kilometer, with bonus for higher cabin class and tier status.

---

### 2. **Booking Upgrades**

- **Upgrade using cash or SkyPoints 24 and earn points on the original and upgraded booking value.**

---

### 3. **Partner Flights**

- **Earn SkyPoints 24 on partner airline flights:**
    - Book with CloudWay 24â€™s code-share and alliance partners using your SkyPoints 24 membership number.
    - Points accrual depends on the fare class and partner agreement.

---

### 4. **Hotel & Car Rental Partners**

- **Book with CloudWay 24 hotel or rental car partners through CloudWay24.com or app:**
    - Add your SkyPoints 24 number when booking to earn points for eligible stays/rentals.

---

### 5. **Shopping & Lifestyle Partners**

- **Earn points by shopping with CloudWay 24 retail, dining, and lifestyle partners:**
    - See the latest partner list and eligible offers on CloudWay24.com or the app.

---

### 6. **Special Promotions**

- **Participate in exclusive promotions:**
    - Bonus SkyPoints 24 on select routes, during festive periods, or for milestone journeys.
    - Check â€œOffers & Promotionsâ€ on the website/app or your registered email for details.

---

## **How to Maximize Points**

- **Book directly:** Reserve flights via CloudWay24.com or the official app for full points.
- **Choose higher cabins:** Higher fares (CloudLux, CloudElite) yield more points.
- **Link your SkyPoints 24 number:** Always provide your membership number for every eligible booking and purchase.
- **Look out for double/mileage bonus promotions!**

---

## **Track Your Points**

- Access your account on CloudWay24.com or the CloudWay24 app  
- Check â€œMy SkyPoints 24â€ dashboard for:
    - Earned, bonus, and pending points balance
    - Recent transactions and activity history

---

## **Important Notes**

- **Points eligibility:** Only qualifying fares and eligible partners earn SkyPoints 24.
- **Retro-claim:** Missed points? Submit a retro-claim via the SkyPoints 24 section within 6 months of your travel/purchase.
- **Terms Apply**: Please refer to the detailed SkyPoints 24 program T&Cs at [CloudWay24.com](https://www.cloudway24.com).

---

### Ready to start earning? [Sign Up or Log In](https://www.cloudway24.com) to SkyPoints 24â€”and let your journeys be more rewarding!

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 Employee Free Tickets & Discounts Policy

At CloudWay 24, we recognize the dedication and hard work of our employees by offering exclusive travel privileges. Our employee travel benefits are tailored to provide both flexibility and exceptional value, across all cabin classes.

---

## ðŸŽ« Employee Free Tickets Policy

**All full-time CloudWay 24 employees are eligible for:**
- **4 (four) round-trip international tickets per calendar year**  
  - These can be used by the employee or together for family travel
  - Employees may use all 4 round-trip tickets at once for family trips  

**Ticket Details:**
- Eligible routes: Any CloudWay 24 operated international route
- Validity: Tickets must be used within the calendar year; unused tickets will not roll-over

---

## ðŸ¥‡ Special Entitlement for Pilots & Senior Members

**Pilots and employees at Senior Management level and above are entitled to:**
- Complimentary upgrade to **CloudElite (Business Class)** on their 4 annual free round-trip tickets

**Additional Perks:**
- Priority check-in and boarding
- Lounge access for themselves and accompanying family using free tickets

---

## ðŸš¸ Family Travel Usage

- Employees can opt to use all 4 round-trip tickets in one go for family travel (e.g., 1 trip with the employee + 3 family members)
- Family defined as: spouse, children, or dependent parents, as registered in HR records

---

## âœˆï¸ Additional Travel Discounts

- Beyond the 4 free round trips, employees receive:
  - **50% discount** on unlimited additional tickets (Economy Class)
  - Upgrades to higher cabin classes at special staff rates (subject to availability)
  - SkyPoints 24 loyalty program points are earned on discounted tickets (unless otherwise specified)

---

## ðŸš¨ Terms & Conditions

- All bookings must be made via the **CloudWay 24 Staff Portal**.

markdown_content:
# Upgrade Your Seat with CloudWay 24

CloudWay 24 is committed to providing exceptional comfort and flexibility for all our passengers. Whether you seek additional legroom or wish to experience our top-tier service and amenities, upgrading your seat is seamless with CloudWay 24.

---

##  Why Upgrade?
- **Enhanced Comfort:** Enjoy wider seats, additional legroom, and premium cabin amenities.
- **Exclusive Services:** Priority check-in, extra baggage allowance, gourmet meals, and lounge access (varies by cabin).
- **Personalized Experience:** Dedicated crew and a curated selection of entertainment and dining options.

---

## Cabin Classes Available for Upgrade

- **CloudSaver (Economy)** â†’ **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)**
- **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)** â†’ **CloudElite (Business Class)**
- **CloudElite (Business Class)** â†’ **CloudLux (First Class)**

---

## How to Upgrade Your Seat

1. **Visit Us Online or Use Our App**
   - Go to [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or open the *CloudWay24* app.
   - Login to your account.

2. **Access "Manage My Flight"**
   - Select the booking you want to upgrade.
   - Click on "Upgrade Your Seat."

3. **Choose Your Preferred Cabin Class**
   - View available seats across higher classes.
   - Review upgrade costs in your preferred currency or pay with your SkyPoints 24 points.

4. **Make Payment**
   - Options: Credit card, Debit card, Netbanking, or SkyPoints 24 points.
   - Confirm your upgrade.

5. **Receive Confirmation**
   - An updated e-ticket will be sent to your email and app.

---

## Additional Ways to Upgrade

- **Airport Upgrade Desk:** Ask at the CloudWay 24 counter during check-in (subject to availability).
- **Upgrade Offers:** Look out for special upgrade emails or in-app notifications before your flight.

---

##  SkyPoints 24 Members

- Use your accumulated points for full or partial upgrades.
- Tier status may offer complimentary or discounted upgrades on select flights (check your benefits).

---

##  Important Notes

- Upgrades are subject to seat availability.
- Upgrade fees and points required are non-refundable, unless the airline initiates the downgrade.
- Terms and conditions apply; refer to our website for details.

---

## Need Help?

Contact our 24x7 customer support via:
- Chat on the CloudWay24 app
- Email: support@cloudway24.com
- Phone: (Toll-free numbers available on the website)

---

**CloudWay 24 â€” Seamless Skies, Global Reach.**

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 Staff Expense Claim Procedure  
*For Pilots and Cabin Crew â€“ Non-Accommodation and Non-Transport Expenses*  

---

## Overview
This procedure outlines how CloudWay 24 Pilots and Cabin Crew may claim reimbursement for approved expenses incurred during duty travel, excluding accommodation and transport (which are already provided by the airline).

---

## 1. Eligible Expenses

- **Meals & Refreshments:** When not provided by CloudWay 24 during layovers.
- **Communication Costs:** Work-related calls/internet when airline-provided options are unavailable.
- **Uniform Maintenance:** Laundry or pressing services during extended layovers (minimum 2 nights).
- **Official Miscellaneous Purchases:** Items bought at the explicit request of a supervisor (e.g., minor crew supplies).
- **Other Approved Costs:** As pre-authorized by Flight Operations or Cabin Services Management.

> _Personal entertainment, alcohol (unless required for official functions), souvenirs, or gifts are **NOT reimbursable**._

---

## 2. Expense Limits

- **Meal Allowance:** Per-diem rates as per company policy by city/destination (refer to Intranet or ask HR).
- **Communication:** Maximum INR 1,000 per trip, unless pre-approved for higher spend.
- **Uniform Maintenance:** Up to INR 500 per eligible layover.

_If in doubt, seek written approval from your Line Manager before incurring the expense._

---

## 3. Claim Submission Process

### a) Documentation Required
- **Original Receipts:** Must state amount, date, item/service, and location.
- **Expense Claim Form:** Downloadable from CloudWay 24 Staff Portal.
- **Supervisor Approval:** (If claiming under â€˜Other Approved Costsâ€™).

### b) Submission Timeline
- Submit claims **within 30 days** of completion of the trip/duty.

### c) How to Submit
1. Log in to CloudWay 24 Staff Portal.
2. Navigate to: **HR Services > Expense Claims**.
3. Fill in all required details, upload scanned receipts.
4. Add any required remarks/supervisory approvals.
5. Submit for Processing.

---

## 4. Processing & Reimbursement

- Claims reviewed within **7 business days**.
- If approved, reimbursement via salary or direct bank credit in the next pay cycle.
- Incomplete or non-compliant claims will be returned for correction.

---

## 5. Contact

- For claim status, contact: **HR Helpdesk** (hr@cloudway24.com)
- For policy clarifications, contact: **Flight Ops Admin Team** or **Cabin Services Admin Team**

---

**Remember:** Falsification of expenses may result in disciplinary action, up to and including termination of employment.

---

# Careers at CloudWay 24

Welcome to **CloudWay 24 Careers**â€”where your journey takes off!  
Join one of Indiaâ€™s fastest-growing international airlines and help us redefine the skies with innovation, dedication, and world-class service.

---

## Why Join CloudWay 24?

CloudWay 24 isnâ€™t just an airline; itâ€™s a global family that believes in connecting people, cultures, and opportunities through seamless travel experiences. We aspire to excellence in everything we doâ€”whether in the air or on the ground. At CloudWay 24, your career can soar as high as our Dreamliners!

---

## Life at CloudWay 24

### Our Culture
- **Inclusive & Diverse:** We celebrate diversity and believe every team member contributes to our collective success.
- **Customer-Focused:** Delivering memorable experiences is at the heart of our mission.
- **Innovation-Driven:** Encourage new ideas and provide opportunities to redefine air travel.
- **Team Spirit:** Strong collaboration between cockpit, cabin crew, ground staff, engineers, and corporate teams.

### Employee Benefits

- **Competitive Compensation**  
- **Medical & Wellness Programs**  
- **Travel Benefits (for you & family)**  
- **SkyPoints 24 membership perks**  
- **Learning & Development Programs**  
- **Performance Bonuses & Rewards**  
- **Flexible Schedules & Remote Work Opportunities (selected roles)**  
- **Employee Assistance Programs**  

### Work Environment
- Modern offices at our Mumbai HQ and airport hubs
- Open communication & transparent leadership
- A culture of recognition and respect

---

## Current Opportunities

Weâ€™re always searching for passionate professionals in:

- **Cabin Crew (Flight Attendants)**
- **Pilots (Wide-body & Narrow-body)**
- **Ground Operations**
- **Customer Service & Call Center**
- **Engineering & Maintenance**
- **IT & Digital Solutions**
- **Sales & Marketing**
- **Finance & Human Resources**
- **Airport Lounge Staff**

[**Explore Latest Openings â†’**](https://cloudway24.com/careers)

---

## Global Exposure

With operations spanning Asia, Europe, North America, and the Middle East, every role at CloudWay 24 offers global exposure and the chance to be part of something extraordinary.

---

## Hear From Our Team

> â€œCloudWay 24 is about growth, learning, and making meaningful connections. Every day brings new challenges, and I love being part of a team that supports each other.â€  
> â€” Meera S., Senior Cabin Crew

> â€œFrom day one, the SkyPoints 24 program and travel perks made me feel I was part of a global community.â€  
> â€” Arjun N., IT & Innovation Lead

---

## How to Apply

Itâ€™s simple:

1. **Visit:** [CloudWay24.com/careers](https://cloudway24.com/careers)
2. **Sign up** with your email or mobile.
3. **Browse** open positions, upload your CV, and submit your application.

âš¡ *Start your journey with CloudWay 24â€”where the sky is never the limit!*

- **Location:** Mumbai, Delhi, Bengaluru (Based at our main hubs)
- **Working Hours:** Shift-based (Including weekends & public holidays); 40-48 hours/week
- **Educational Qualifications:**
  - B.E./B.Tech in Aeronautical/Mechanical/Electrical Engineering **OR**
  - DGCA-approved Aircraft Maintenance Engineer License (B1/B2)

  â‚¹8 â€“ â‚¹18 LPA (Based on experience) + Annual Performance Bonus + Other Benefits

  - Conduct checks, troubleshooting, repairs, and certify aircraft before flight release.

  - Oversee documentation and record-keeping per company and legal requirements.

Careers at CloudWay 24 â€“ Engineering Department > **Open Positions in Engineering** > 2. **Avionics Engineer**
- **Location:** Mumbai, Delhi, Bengaluru
- **Working Hours:** Rotational shifts; 40 hours/week
- **Educational Qualifications:**
  - B.E./B.Tech in Avionics/Electronics Engineering
  - Preferably with DGCA / EASA Aircraft Maintenance License (B2 Category)
- **Package:**  
  â‚¹10 â€“ â‚¹20 LPA + Allowances + Medical & Travel Benefits
- **Roles & Responsibilities:**
  - Maintenance, troubleshooting and upgrades of avionics systems (navigation, communication, flight control, etc.).
  - Ensure optimum functioning of all electronic safety and operational equipment onboard.
  - Liaise with Airworthiness and Quality Assurance departments.
  - Innovate and implement new technology upgrades in coordination with OEMs.

Careers at CloudWay 24 â€“ Engineering Department > **Open Positions in Engineering** > 3. **Engineering Support Specialist**
- **Location:** Mumbai (Head Office)  
- **Working Hours:** Standard (9 AM â€“ 6 PM, Mon-Fri)
- **Educational Qualifications:**
  - Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Mechanical/Industrial Engineering or similar
  - Proficient in AMOS or equivalent MRO software
- **Package:**  
  â‚¹6 â€“ â‚¹13 LPA + Incentives
- **Roles & Responsibilities:**
  - Provide technical and logistical support to line and base maintenance teams.
  - Maintain parts inventory, coordinate engineering resources for AOG (Aircraft On Ground) events.
  - Assist in engineering data analysis, technical documentation, and regulatory submissions.
  - Work closely with procurement and vendor management for spares and materials.

Careers at CloudWay 24: Cabin Crew Recruitment > Job Title
**Cabin Crew Member**

Careers at CloudWay 24: Cabin Crew Recruitment > Working Hours
- **Roster-based Shifts:** 8â€“12 hours per shift, including weekends, holidays, and overnight layovers.
- **Flexible Schedules:** Aligned with international flight operations and layovers.

Careers at CloudWay 24: Cabin Crew Recruitment > Location
- **Primary Location:** Mumbai, India (Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport)
- **Additional Base Locations:** Delhi (Indira Gandhi International Airport) & Bengaluru (Kempegowda International Airport)
- International layovers based on operational requirements.

Careers at CloudWay 24: Cabin Crew Recruitment > Educational Qualifications
- Minimum 10+2 (Higher Secondary) from a recognized board.
- Diploma / Degree in Hospitality, Travel, or Customer Service preferred (not mandatory).
- Proficiency in English (spoken & written). Additional languages are an advantage.

Careers at CloudWay 24: Cabin Crew Recruitment > Package & Benefits
- **Salary:** INR 6â€“8 lakhs per annum (starting, based on experience & location)
- **Allowances:** International layover allowance, flying allowance, and meal allowance.
- **Benefits:** Medical & life insurance, comprehensive training, annual leave, free/reduced flight tickets (for self & family), and access to CloudWay 24 Lounges.
- **Incentives:** Performance and service excellence bonuses.
- Membership in the exclusive **SkyPoints 24 Staff Rewards Program**.

Careers at CloudWay 24: Cabin Crew Recruitment > Roles & Responsibilities
- **Passenger Safety:** Ensure safety and security procedures are executed as per global aviation standards.
- **World-Class Service:** Deliver premium in-flight service in all cabin classesâ€”CloudLux, CloudElite, CloudComfort, and CloudSaver.
- **Pre-Flight Checks:** Conduct safety checks before flight boarding.
- **Passenger Comfort:** Assist passengers with seating, stowage of baggage, and comfort-related requests.
- **Emergency Handling:** Professionally handle medical emergencies, turbulence, and evacuations if required.
- **Communication:** Make announcements and communicate information clearly and efficiently.
- **Team Collaboration:** Work harmoniously with the crew, flight deck, and ground teams.
- **Brand Representation:** Uphold and embody the CloudWay 24 valuesâ€”excellence, empathy, and professionalism at all times.

Other Open Positions > 1. Legal Officer
**Department:** Legal  
**Location:** Head Office, Mumbai, India  
**Working Hours:** Full-Time (Mon-Fri, 9:00 AM â€“ 6:00 PM)  
**Educational Qualifications:**  
- Bachelorâ€™s degree in Law (LLB) from a recognized university  
- Enrollment with the Bar Council of India  
- Masterâ€™s degree (LLM) preferred
**Package:** â‚¹9 â€“ 13 LPA (Based on experience)
**Roles & Responsibilities:**
- Draft, review, and negotiate contracts and agreements with vendors, partners, and clients.
- Ensure company compliance with local, national, and international aviation laws and regulations.
- Advise various departments on legal risks and mitigation strategies.
- Coordinate and manage regulatory filings and statutory obligations.
- Represent the company in legal proceedings and liaise with external counsel when required.
- Conduct legal research and monitor legislative changes impacting the aviation industry.

Other Open Positions > 2. HR Business Partner
**Department:** Human Resources  
**Location:** Head Office, Mumbai, India  
**Working Hours:** Full-Time (Mon-Fri, 9:00 AM â€“ 6:00 PM)  
**Educational Qualifications:**  
- Bachelorâ€™s degree in Human Resources/Business Administration or related field  
- MBA/PGDM in HR preferred
**Package:** â‚¹8 â€“ 12 LPA (Based on experience)
**Roles & Responsibilities:**
- Act as a consultant to management on human resource-related issues.
- Implement and manage recruitment, onboarding, and talent management processes.
- Develop employee engagement, learning, and development initiatives.
- Handle employee relations by addressing concerns, grievances, or other issues.
- Analyze HR data to identify trends and recommend solutions for workforce planning.
- Ensure compliance with company policies, labor laws, and industry regulations.
- Drive diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives within the organization.

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 â€“ Student Offers

CloudWay 24 recognizes the unique travel needs of students pursuing education or attending academic events across the globe. Our exclusive **Student Offers** provide valuable benefits and flexibility, making international journeys more affordable and comfortable!

---

## **Student Offer Highlights**

- **Up to 10% Discount**  
  Enjoy special fares with up to 10% off* on CloudSaver (Economy) and CloudComfort (Premium Economy) fares for students aged 18â€“30.

- **Extra Baggage Allowance**  
  Travel worry-free! Students get **1 additional checked bag (up to 23kg)** on all international routes.

- **Flexible Date Change**  
  One-time free date change** in case your travel plans or academic schedule changes.

- **Priority Check-In**  
  Skip the queue with dedicated student check-in counters at major CloudWay 24 hubs.

- **SkyPoints 24 Bonus**  
  Earn **500 bonus SkyPoints 24** for your first student booking.

---

## **Who Can Avail?**

- Students aged 18â€“30 years
- Possessing a valid student ID or university admission/offer letter
- Bookings for outbound or inbound international flights from India

---

## **How to Book the Student Offer?**

1. **Sign Up/Login**  
   Register on [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com) or the CloudWay24 App  
   (Email or mobile verification required)

2. **Plan Your Flight**  
   Select â€œStudent Fareâ€ when booking.  
   Choose your route, travel dates, and cabin class.

3. **Upload/Verify Student ID**  
   At checkout, upload a valid student ID/admission letter for verification.

4. **Pay Securely**  
   Choose your preferred payment option:  
   - Credit Card  
   - Debit Card  
   - Netbanking  
   - SkyPoints 24 points

---

## **Manage Your Student Booking**

Go to **â€œManage My Flightâ€** (via web/app):  
- Modify or cancel your booking  
- Change seats or upgrade
- Web check-in

---

## **Terms & Conditions**

- *Up to 10% discount applicable only on base fare; taxes and surcharges apply.
- **One-time free date change permitted up to 48 hours before scheduled departure.
- Additional baggage allowed only upon presenting proof at check-in desk.
- Offer subject to seat availability and black-out dates (public holidays, peak seasons).
- CloudWay 24 reserves the right to withdraw/modify the offer at any time.

---

**Fly smarter, further, and lighter with CloudWay 24 Student Offers!**

> For details and support, visit [CloudWay24.com/student-offers](https://CloudWay24.com/student-offers) or contact our 24x7 student help desk.

markdown_content:
# Boeing 787 Dreamliner â€“ CloudWay 24 Fleet Overview

CloudWay 24 operates a modern fleet of Boeing 787 Dreamliners, renowned for their fuel efficiency, passenger comfort, and advanced technology. Below is an overview of the aircraftâ€™s seating capacity and detailed breakdown of class-wise cabin features as configured for CloudWay 24â€™s international long-haul service.

---

## Aircraft: Boeing 787 Dreamliner

- **Total Seating Capacity:** 290 seats *(Typical CloudWay 24 configuration)*

---

## Cabin Class & Seating Configuration

| Cabin Class    | No. of Seats | Configuration  |
|----------------|:------------:|---------------|
| CloudLux       | 8            | 1-2-1         |
| CloudElite     | 32           | 1-2-1         |
| CloudComfort   | 40           | 2-3-2         |
| CloudSaver     | 210          | 3-3-3         |

---

## Cabin Class Features

### 1. CloudLux (First Class)
- **Seating:** 180Â° lie-flat suites with privacy doors
- **Amenities:** Personal wardrobe, luxury amenity kit, plush duvet & pillow
- **Entertainment:** 22-inch HD screen, noise-cancelling headphones
- **Dining:** Gourmet Ã  la carte dining, exclusive fine wines & spirits
- **Other:** Priority boarding, chauffeur service (select routes), access to CloudWay 24 First Lounge

### 2. CloudElite (Business Class)
- **Seating:** Full-flat beds, direct aisle access
- **Amenities:** Premium bedding, enhanced amenity kit
- **Entertainment:** 18-inch HD touch screen, premium headphones
- **Dining:** Multi-course menu, curated beverage selection
- **Other:** Priority check-in, lounge access

### 3. CloudComfort (Premium Economy)
- **Seating:** Wider seats, extra legroom (38â€ pitch), deeper recline
- **Amenities:** Amenity kit, plush blanket & pillow
- **Entertainment:** 13-inch personal screen
- **Dining:** Upgraded meal selection, complimentary beverage service
- **Other:** Priority boarding

### 4. CloudSaver (Economy)
- **Seating:** Ergonomically-designed seats (31â€“32â€ pitch)
- **Amenities:** Standard bedding, basic amenity kit on long-haul
- **Entertainment:** 10-inch personal screen with on-demand movies, TV, games
- **Dining:** Complimentary meals & snacks, beverage service

---

## Additional Onboard Features

- High-speed Wi-Fi connectivity (paid and complimentary plans by class)
- USB and universal power outlets in all cabins
- Mood lighting and improved cabin air quality
- Extra-large, dimmable windows

---

**For more details and to book your CloudWay 24 Dreamliner experience, visit [CloudWay24.com](https://www.CloudWay24.com) or use the CloudWay 24 mobile app.**

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 â€“ Feedback & Complaints

At **CloudWay 24**, we are dedicated to providing you with the highest standard of service. Your feedback and complaints are invaluable to us as they help us improve your travel experience. If you have any feedback, suggestions, or concerns regarding your recent journey, please reach out using any of the channels listed below.

---

## How to Share Your Feedback or File a Complaint

### 1. **Online Feedback/Complaint Form**

- Visit: [CloudWay24.com/feedback](https://cloudway24.com/feedback) *(Sample URL)*
- Fill out the form with details about your journey, feedback, or issue.
- Provide your booking reference (PNR), flight details, and contact information for prompt assistance.

---

### 2. **CloudWay 24 Mobile App**

- Open the CloudWay 24 app (available on iOS/Android)
- Go to: `Support` > `Feedback & Complaints`
- Complete the guided form and submit your comments or issue.

---

### 3. **Customer Support Email**

- Email your feedback or complaint to: [support@cloudway24.com](mailto:support@cloudway24.com)
- Subject line: *Feedback/Complaint â€“ [Booking Reference/Flight Number]*
- Include details such as:
  - Your full name
  - Contact information
  - Flight details (date/route/class)
  - Description of your experience or issue
  - Attach supporting documents (if any)

---

### 4. **Customer Care Helpline**

- Call us at: +91-22-1234-2424
- Available 24/7 for immediate assistance
- Please have your booking reference handy for faster resolution.

---

### 5. **Airport Customer Service Desks**

- Visit CloudWay 24 service desks at all main international airports (Mumbai, Delhi, Bengaluru).
- Speak directly to a representative regarding your feedback or complaint.

---

## What Happens Next?

- **Acknowledgement:** You will receive an acknowledgement within 24 hours of submitting your feedback or complaint.
- **Investigation:** Our customer care team will review and investigate your case thoroughly.
- **Resolution:** You will receive a response and resolution via email or phone within 7 business days. Complex cases may require additional time.

---

## Commitment to Customers

CloudWay 24 values your input and strives to resolve all issues fairly, transparently, and promptly, ensuring your journey remains seamless. Thank you for helping us improve.

---

**For additional information, visit:**  
[CloudWay24.com/help](https://cloudway24.com/help)

- Go to: `Support` > `Feedback & Complaints`
- Complete the guided form and submit your comments or issue.
3. **Customer Support Email**
- Email your feedback or complaint to: [support@cloudway24.com](mailto:support@cloudway24.com)
- Subject line: *Feedback/Complaint â€“ [Booking Reference/Flight Number]*
- Include details such as:
  - Your full name
  - Contact information
  - Flight details (date/route/class)
  - Description of your experience or issue
  - Attach supporting documents (if any)
4. **Customer Care Helpline**
- Call us at: +91-22-1234-2424
- Available 24/7 for immediate assistance
- Please have your booking reference handy for faster resolution.
5. **Airport Customer Service Desks**
- Visit CloudWay 24 service desks at all main international airports (Mumbai, Delhi, Bengaluru).
- Speak directly to a representative regarding your feedback or complaint.

Block 2: CloudWay 24 â€“ Feedback & Complaints > What Happens Next?
- **Acknowledgement:** You will receive an acknowledgement within 24 hours of submitting your feedback or complaint.
- **Investigation:** Our customer care team will review and investigate your case thoroughly.
- **Resolution:** You will receive a response and resolution via email or phone within 7 business days. Complex cases may require additional time.

Block 3: CloudWay 24 â€“ Feedback & Complaints > Commitment to Customers
CloudWay 24 values your input and strives to resolve all issues fairly, transparently, and promptly, ensuring your journey remains seamless. Thank you for helping us improve.

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 â€“ Passenger Rights

At CloudWay 24, we are committed to providing a safe, comfortable, and reliable travel experience for all our passengers. We believe in transparency, prompt communication, and protecting the interests of our travelers. Below are your fundamental passenger rights when flying with CloudWay 24.

---

## 1. **Right to Information**

- **Clear Fare & Fee Disclosure:** You are entitled to complete information regarding fares, taxes, surcharges, and any additional fees at the time of booking.
- **Booking Confirmation & Updates:** You will receive prompt electronic confirmation of your booking and any schedule changes, delays, or cancellations.

---

## 2. **Right to Care & Assistance**

- **Delays and Cancellations:**  
  - If your flight is delayed by more than 2 hours or cancelled, you are entitled to meals, refreshments, and communication assistance (calls, emails).
  - For overnight delays, you are entitled to hotel accommodation and ground transfers where applicable.
- **Denied Boarding:**  
  - If you are denied boarding involuntarily (e.g., due to overbooking), you will be offered alternate travel options or a full refund, along with compensation as per regulatory norms.

---

## 3. **Right to Refunds and Compensation**

- **Refunds:**  
  - In case of flight cancellation or significant schedule change by CloudWay 24, you are entitled to a full refund or rebooking at no additional cost.
- **Compensation:**  
  - You may be eligible for compensation for flight delays, cancellations, or baggage issues as per DGCA guidelines and international conventions.

---

## 4. **Right to Comfort and Special Assistance**

- **Mobility and Medical Needs:**  
  - Passengers with reduced mobility or special requirements can request assistance during booking or up to 48 hours before departure.
- **Unaccompanied Minors & Elderly:**  
  - Safe travel and assistance are available for children and elderly passengers traveling alone.

---

## 5. **Right to Baggage Protection**

- **Lost or Damaged Baggage:**  
  - If your checked baggage is lost, delayed, or damaged, you are entitled to compensation as per airline and international regulations.
- **Prompt Tracing and Updates:**  
  - Our team will keep you informed and work towards swift baggage location and return.

---

## 6. **Right to Privacy and Data Protection**

- **Secure Handling of Data:**  
  - All personal and payment data is handled securely as per data protection laws and CloudWay 24 privacy policy.
- **Right to Opt-out:**  
  - You can opt-out of promotional communications at any time.

---

## 7. **Right to Customer Support and Redressal**

- **24/7 Support:**  
  - Access to customer support via phone, email, and chat for queries or grievances.
- **Feedback & Complaint Resolution:**  
  - Passengers can submit complaints online or through our app; we aim to resolve all issues in a fair and timely manner.

---

## Need Assistance?
Visit [CloudWay24.com/support](https://CloudWay24.com/support) or contact us through the CloudWay24 app for more information on your rights or to lodge a complaint.

---

**CloudWay 24 is dedicated to upholding your rights and ensuring a seamless, fair, and enjoyable travel experience.**

markdown_content:
# Change Your Seat with CloudWay 24

CloudWay 24 offers a simple and flexible process for changing your seat to suit your comfort and preference. Whether you want extra legroom, prefer a window or aisle seat, or wish to sit closer to the front, you can manage your seat selection seamlessly through our website or mobile app.

---

##  How to Change Your Seat

### 1. Log in to Your Account
- Visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or open the **CloudWay24 App** (iOS & Android).
- Log in using your registered email or mobile number.

### 2. Navigate to â€œManage My Flightâ€
- Select **Manage My Flight** from the main menu/dashboard.
- Enter your booking reference (PNR) and last name to access your reservation.

### 3. Select â€œChange Your Seatâ€ Option
- Find your upcoming journey from the list.
- Click on **Change your seat** under your flight details.

### 4. Choose Your Preferred Seat
- View the interactive seat map for your selected flight.
- Choose your new seat based on availability and cabin class:
    - **CloudLux** *(First Class)*
    - **CloudElite** *(Business Class)*
    - **CloudComfort** *(Premium Economy)*
    - **CloudSaver** *(Economy)*
- Note: Some seats (such as extra legroom or preferred locations) may carry an additional charge.

### 5. Review & Confirm
- Review any price difference, if applicable.
- Confirm your new seat selection.
- Receive instant confirmation and updated boarding pass.

---

## Payment Options

- **Credit Card**
- **Debit Card**
- **Netbanking**
- **SkyPoints 24 Points** (loyalty rewards)

---

## Useful Information

- You can change your seat up until online check-in closes (generally 1 hour before departure).
- Seat changes are subject to availability.
- Loyalty members may have complimentary or discounted seat change options depending on SkyPoints 24 tier status.

---

## Need Help?

If you have any trouble changing your seat, contact our **24/7 Customer Support** via live chat, email, or phone through the CloudWay 24 app or website.

**Fly your wayâ€”choose your preferred seat with CloudWay 24 for a journey tailored to you!**

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 Dangerous Goods Policy

As per international aviation safety regulations and CloudWay 24's commitment to passenger safety, certain items are classified as **Dangerous Goods** and are strictly regulated. Please review the following policy to ensure compliance and avoid inconvenience during travel.

---

## General Guidelines

- **Prohibited Items:** Items that present a risk to health, safety, property, or the environment are **strictly prohibited**.
- **Declaration:** All dangerous goods must be declared at the time of check-in.
- **Special Permission:** Some items may be allowed only with prior approval.

---

## Dangerous Goods Allowance Table

| Item Category                   | Check-In Baggage         | Hand Baggage             | Remarks                                                         |
|----------------------------------|-------------------------|--------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Explosives/Fireworks**         | Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Includes fireworks, flares, party poppers, ammunition.           |
| **Compressed Gases (incl. LPG)** |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Includes butane, propane, oxygen cylinders (except for medical use with prior approval). |
| **Flammable Liquids**            |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Includes paints, thinners, petrol, solvents, lighter fluid.      |
| **Flammable Solids**             |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Safety matches (1 small box per person in person only, not in bag) |
| **Poisons/Toxics**               |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Includes pesticides, arsenic, cyanide.                          |
| **Radioactive Materials**        |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | For commercial shipment only, not allowed for passenger baggage.|
| **Corrosives**                   |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Includes batteries (industrial), mercury, acids, bleach.         |
| **Lithium Batteries (Spare)**    | * See Remarks         |  Up to 2, <=100Wh      | Only for personal electronic devices; spares in hand baggage only. Max 2 per passenger. |
| **Household Aerosols (Non-flammable, Non-toxic)** | * Limited qty           |  100ml max each; total 1L | Aerosols (toiletries) in hand baggage subject to liquid restrictions. |
| **Medicines/Personal Toiletries**|  Allowed in limited qty|  Limited qty (100ml each)| Must be for personal use and non-explosive/non-flammable.     |
| **Small Oxygen Cylinders (Medical Need)** |  With Approval             |  With Approval           | Must be medically necessary, documentation required.             |
| **Alcoholic Beverages**          |  â‰¤5L, <70% ABV        |  â‰¤100ml per bottle (in international transit as duty free) | Must be sealed, per applicable duty-free regulations.            |
| **Sharp Objects/Tools**          |  With Restrictions    |  Not Allowed           | Knives, box cutters, scissors with blades >6cm in check-in only.|
| **E-cigarettes/Vaping Devices**  |  Not Allowed in check-in |  In hand baggage only   | Not for use onboard; spare batteries in hand baggage only.       |
| **Power Banks**                  |  Not Allowed          |  Max 2, <=100Wh each   | Not to be checked in under any circumstances.                    |
| **Self-heating Meals/Devices**   |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Includes flameless ration heaters.                               |

---

### Key:
-  Allowed (with or without restrictions as noted)
-  Not Allowed
- * See Remarks: Additional conditions apply

---

## Important Notes

- **Liquids, Gels, Aerosols:** In hand baggage, each container must be 100ml or less; total may not exceed 1 litre per passenger (packed in a clear, resealable bag).
- **Electronics:** Lithium battery-operated equipment may be carried in both check-in and hand baggage, but spares must only be in hand baggage and protected from short-circuiting.
- **Sharp Items:** Prohibited in hand baggage. Limited sizes and types may go in checked baggage if securely packed.

---

### For full list and updates, please refer to [CloudWay24.com/dangerous-goods](https://CloudWay24.com/dangerous-goods) or contact our customer service before your journey.

*Failure to comply may result in removal of prohibited items, denial of boarding, or legal action as per applicable law.*

---

markdown_content:
# How to Book a Flight with CloudWay 24

CloudWay 24 offers an easy and seamless booking experience via their website and mobile app (available for iOS and Android). Follow these steps to book your next international journey!

---

## Step-by-Step Guide to Booking a Flight

### 1. **Sign Up / Log In**
- Visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or open the CloudWay 24 app.
- Sign up or log in using your email address or mobile number.

---

### 2. **Start Your Booking**
- Click or tap on **"Plan My Flight"**.

---

### 3. **Select Your Trip Type**
- Choose either:
  - **Round Trip**
  - **One Way**

---

### 4. **Choose Your Route**
- Select your:
  - **Source city** (e.g., Mumbai, Delhi, Bengaluru)
  - **Destination city** (e.g., New York, London, Dubai, Sydney, etc.)
- Enter preferred **departure** and (if round-trip) **return dates**.

---

### 5. **Pick Your Cabin Class**
- **CloudLux (First Class)**
- **CloudElite (Business Class)**
- **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)**
- **CloudSaver (Economy)**

---

### 6. **Confirm Flight Options**
- Browse available flights and select the one that best suits your schedule and preferences.

---

### 7. **Enter Passenger Details**
- Fill in details for all travelers in your booking.

---

### 8. **Payment**
- Choose your payment method:
  - **Credit Card**
  - **Debit Card**
  - **Netbanking**
  - **SkyPoints 24** loyalty points (for eligible members)
- Complete the payment process to confirm your booking.

---

### 9. **Booking Confirmation**
- Receive an instant booking confirmation via email and SMS.
- Your itinerary will also be available in the "Manage My Flight" section.

---

## Additional Features

### **Manage My Flight**
- **Cancel your booking**
- **Change your booking**
- **Choose or change your seat**
- **Upgrade your flight**
- **Manage chauffeur-drive**
- **Book accessible travel**
- **Check-in online** (or use other check-in options)

---

### **Contact & Support**
For additional assistance, visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or use in-app support.

---

*Enjoy a seamless booking and flying experience with CloudWay 24 â€“ Seamless Skies, Global Reach.*

markdown_content:
# Special Assistance at CloudWay 24

CloudWay 24 is committed to making air travel accessible, comfortable, and convenient for every passenger. If you require any kind of special assistance for your journey, our dedicated team is here to help at every step â€“ from booking your ticket to arriving at your final destination.

---

## How to Request Special Assistance

You can request special assistance:
- During the booking process on **CloudWay24.com** or the **CloudWay24 mobile app**  
- By contacting our Customer Service Team via email or phone  
- At the airport check-in counter prior to your flight

**Note:** For the best experience, please inform us at least 48 hours before departure.

---

## Types of Special Assistance We Offer

### Mobility Assistance
- Wheelchair service at departure and arrival airports  
- Assistance with boarding, deplaning, and transferring between flights  
- Pre-boarding option for passengers with mobility needs

### Elderly & Unaccompanied Minors
- Escort service for seniors traveling alone  
- Special care and supervision for unaccompanied minors (UMNR program)  
- Priority boarding and disembarkation

### Assistance for Passengers with Visual or Hearing Impairments
- Personal escort to/out of the aircraft  
- Safety briefing in accessible formats  
- Visual/tactile guide and assistance with forms and immigration procedures

### Medical Assistance
- Oxygen cylinders and related devices, subject to prior approval  
- Assistance for passengers traveling with personal medical equipment or medication  
- Stretcher service on select flights (by prior arrangement and subject to charges)

### Special Dietary Needs
- Selection of special meals (vegetarian, low-sodium, diabetic, gluten-free, etc.)  
- Requests can be made during booking or up to 24 hours before departure

---

## Guidelines & Additional Information

- **Advance Notice:** Some services require advance notification and submission of medical documents.  
- **Medical Fitness:** In certain cases, a Medical Information Form (MEDIF) may be required from your doctor.  
- **Traveling with Assistance Devices:** Mobility aids such as wheelchairs and crutches are carried free of charge, subject to space and safety regulations.

---

## Contact Us

- **Customer Care Hotline:** [Insert local/international number]  
- **Email:** support@cloudway24.com  
- **Website:** [CloudWay24.com](https://www.cloudway24.com/help/special-assistance)  
- **At the Airport:** Approach our Special Assistance Desk or any CloudWay 24 staff member.

---

**Your comfort and dignity are our top priorities. Please reach out so we can make your journey as smooth as possible.**

*CloudWay 24 â€“ Seamless Skies, Global Reach.*
