markdown_content:
# Boarding Process with CloudWay 24

CloudWay 24 is committed to delivering a smooth and efficient boarding experience for all passengers. Below is an outline of the standard boarding process, from check-in to takeoff.

---

## 1. **Check-In**

- **Online Check-In:**  
  Available 48 to 2 hours prior to departure via [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or the CloudWay 24 app (iOS & Android).
- **Airport Check-In Counters:**  
  Open 3 hours before international departures and close 60 minutes prior to departure.
- **Required Documents:**  
  Passport, visa (if required), and valid ticket/boarding pass.

---

## 2. **Baggage Drop**

- Proceed to the designated baggage drop counter for your class:  
  - CloudLux / CloudElite: Dedicated Priority Counters  
  - CloudComfort / CloudSaver: Standard Counters
- Ensure all bags abide by CloudWay 24's baggage policy (refer to ticket for details).

---

## 3. **Security & Immigration**

- After check-in, proceed to security and immigration with boarding pass and travel documents.
- Allow additional time for security checks during peak hours.

---

## 4. **Proceed to Gate**

- Check your boarding gate on your boarding pass, the airport displays, or the CloudWay 24 app.
- Boarding gates typically open 60 minutes and close 20 minutes before departure.
- Priority boarding is announced and available for:
  - CloudLux (First Class)  
  - CloudElite (Business Class)  
  - SkyPoints 24 Elite/Frequent Flyers  
  - Passengers requiring special assistance and families with infants

---

## 5. **Boarding Sequence**

1. **Pre-Boarding:**  
   Passengers who need special assistance, unaccompanied minors, and families with small children.
2. **Priority Boarding:**  
   CloudLux, CloudElite, and eligible SkyPoints 24 members.
3. **Zone Boarding:**  
   Remaining passengers board by zone, as indicated on the boarding pass or by gate staff.
4. **Final Call:**  
   Last chance to board; listen for announcements.

---

## 6. **During Boarding**

- Present your boarding pass and identification at the gate.
- Gate staff will scan and verify your documents.
- Follow signs and crew guidance to your designated seat.
- Cabin crew will assist with stowing carry-on luggage and provide information as needed.

---

## 7. **Departure**

- Please be seated and fasten your seatbelt prior to door closure.
- Cabin crew will conduct safety demonstrations and perform final checks.
- Relax and prepare for takeoff â€” your CloudWay 24 journey is about to begin!

---

## Tips for Smooth Boarding

- Download and use the **CloudWay 24 App** for real-time updates, mobile boarding passes, and gate changes.
- Arrive at the airport well in advance, especially for international travel.
- Have all travel documents ready for inspection at each stage.

---

**For additional queries or assistance, visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or contact our customer support.**

_Safe travels with CloudWay 24: Seamless Skies, Global Reach._

- Proceed to the designated baggage drop counter for your class:  
  - CloudLux / CloudElite: Dedicated Priority Counters  
  - CloudComfort / CloudSaver: Standard Counters
- Ensure all bags abide by CloudWay 24's baggage policy (refer to ticket for details).
3. **Security & Immigration**

- After check-in, proceed to security and immigration with boarding pass and travel documents.
- Allow additional time for security checks during peak hours.
4. **Proceed to Gate**

- Check your boarding gate on your boarding pass, the airport displays, or the CloudWay 24 app.
- Boarding gates typically open 60 minutes and close 20 minutes before departure.
- Priority boarding is announced and available for:
  - CloudLux (First Class)  
  - CloudElite (Business Class)  
  - SkyPoints 24 Elite/Frequent Flyers  
  - Passengers requiring special assistance and families with infants
5. **Boarding Sequence**

1. **Pre-Boarding:**  
   Passengers who need special assistance, unaccompanied minors, and families with small children.
2. **Priority Boarding:**  
   CloudLux, CloudElite, and eligible SkyPoints 24 members.
3. **Zone Boarding:**  
   Remaining passengers board by zone, as indicated on the boarding pass or by gate staff.
4. **Final Call:**  
   Last chance to board; listen for announcements.
6. **During Boarding**

- Present your boarding pass and identification at the gate.
- Gate staff will scan and verify your documents.
- Follow signs and crew guidance to your designated seat.
- Cabin crew will assist with stowing carry-on luggage and provide information as needed.
7. **Departure**

- Please be seated and fasten your seatbelt prior to door closure.
- Cabin crew will conduct safety demonstrations and perform final checks.
- Relax and prepare for takeoff â€” your CloudWay 24 journey is about to begin!
Tips for Smooth Boarding

- Download and use the **CloudWay 24 App** for real-time updates, mobile boarding passes, and gate changes.
- Arrive at the airport well in advance, especially for international travel.
- Have all travel documents ready for inspection at each stage.
**For additional queries or assistance, visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or contact our customer support.**
_Safe travels with CloudWay 24: Seamless Skies, Global Reach._

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 Trainee Pilot Programme

CloudWay 24 is committed to nurturing the next generation of world-class aviators through its prestigious **Trainee Pilot Programme**. Designed for passionate and driven individuals, our programme combines rigorous academic instruction, state-of-the-art simulator training, and hands-on flight experience with our modern fleet of Boeing and Airbus aircraft.

---

## Programme Highlights

- **Comprehensive Training:** Ground school, simulator training, and in-aircraft experience.
- **Fleet Exposure:** Practical training on Boeing 787 Dreamliners, Airbus A350, and A380s.
- **Experienced Instructors:** Learn from senior CloudWay 24 captains and industry experts.
- **Career Pathway:** Successful trainees may join CloudWay 24 as Junior First Officers.
- **Stipend & Benefits:** Competitive stipend during training, medical coverage, and travel benefits.

---

## Eligibility Criteria

- **Nationality:** Indian citizens or Overseas Citizens of India (OCI) eligible to work in India.
- **Age:** 18 â€“ 28 years at the time of application.
- **Educational Qualification:**
  - Minimum 10+2 with Physics and Mathematics from a recognized board.
  - Graduates (any discipline) preferred.
- **Medical Fitness:** Must possess (or be able to obtain) DGCA Class 1 Medical Certificate.
- **Language Proficiency:** Proficiency in English (spoken & written). Additional language skills are a plus.
- **Other Requirements:**
  - Unblemished background and good moral character.
  - Passion for aviation and ability to work in a team.

---

## Application Process

1. **Online Application:** Fill out the form on [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com/pilot-programme)
2. **Screening Test:** Aptitude and psychometric assessments.
3. **Personal Interview:** Panel interview with training and HR teams.
4. **Medical Examination:** DGCA Class 1 Medical.
5. **Final Selection:** Offer letter and induction into the training academy.

---

_For detailed syllabus, FAQs, and application deadlines, visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com/pilot-programme) or reach out to pilotcareers@cloudway24.com._

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 â€“ Staff Accommodation Policy: Pilots & Cabin Crew

## Overview
CloudWay 24 prioritizes the comfort and well-being of its onboard crew, recognizing that adequate rest is critical for safety and excellent passenger service. During layovers and duty periods away from home base, all pilots and cabin crew are provided with quality hotel accommodation as per company standards.

---

## Accommodation Policy

### 1. **Eligibility**
- **Pilots:** All flight deck crew members (Captain, First Officer, Relief Pilots) on layover/duty away from home base.
- **Cabin Crew:** All operating crew (CloudLux, CloudElite, CloudComfort, CloudSaver service crew).

---

### 2. **Standard of Hotels**
- 4-star and 5-star hotels, centrally located or near airports.
- Chain hotels preferred for consistency and safety.

---

### 3. **Room Allocation**
- Single occupancy standard for all crew members.
- Secure & private accommodation.
- Twin sharing only by voluntary consent (for short layovers).

---

### 4. **Transfers**
- Complimentary ground transportation between airport and hotel.
- Pre-arranged by CloudWay 24 or authorized handling agent.

---

### 5. **Facilities Provided**
- 24-hour check-in/check-out flexibility for flight disruptions.
- In-room Wi-Fi and meal allowances/buffet breakfast included.
- Crew lounge access where available.
- Health & safety: Chosen hotels have robust security and clean food options.

---

### 6. **Special Provisions**
- Early check-in/late check-out managed for irregular operations.
- Medical support/assistance from hotel or quick connections to local healthcare.
- Emergency contact and escalation with CloudWay 24 Operations Control.

---

### 7. **Booking Procedure**
- Rostered crew bookings made in advance by Crew Scheduling Department.
- Hotel details relayed in daily roster and via CloudWay 24 Crew App.

---

### 8. **Feedback & Quality Control**
- Crew can submit hotel feedback via Crew App/website.
- Regular review and audit of hotel partners to ensure compliance and crew satisfaction.

---

**For further queries on staff accommodation, access the Crew Portal or contact Crew Scheduling.**

---

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 Fine-Dining Menus (Class-wise Overview)

At CloudWay 24, our commitment to culinary excellence shines through in every class. Our menus are expertly curated, inspired by global cuisines and regional favorites, and updated seasonally to offer diversity and freshness. Hereâ€™s a class-wise overview of the fine-dining experience guests can expect on board:

---

## CloudLux (First Class)

**Overview:**  
CloudLux guests enjoy a fully customizable, haute-cuisine experience that blends international delicacies with Indian sophistication. Seasonal tasting menus are available, with options tailored to personal preferences.

**Highlights:**
- **Multi-course gourmet dining**: Starters, main courses, cheese boards, and artisanal desserts
- **Curated international wine and champagne list**
- **Fresh, premium ingredients**: Caviar, Wagyu, fresh seafood, truffles, and global specialty produce
- **Personalized service**: Order Ã  la carte, or request chefâ€™s special creations on select routes
- **Wide range of world cuisines**: French, Italian, Indian Royal, Pan-Asian, Middle Eastern, and more
- **Exclusive beverage pairings**: High-end spirits, aged whiskies, and luxury teas

---

## CloudElite (Business Class)

**Overview:**  
Business travelers in CloudElite enjoy restaurant-style dining with extensive menu options, reflecting both international classics and local dishes.

**Highlights:**
- **Multiple appetizers, mains, and dessert options on every flight**
- **Refined international cuisine**: Grilled meats & fish, traditional Indian curries, Asian specialties, and Mediterranean-inspired dishes
- **Vegetarian and health-focused selections always available**
- **Premium bread basket, cheese plates, and fruit selections**
- **Choice of wine, beer, select spirits, freshly brewed coffee, and teas**

---

## CloudComfort (Premium Economy)

**Overview:**  
CloudComfort offers enhanced meal choices and upgraded presentations compared to standard economy, bridging comfort and quality.

**Highlights:**
- **Multi-course meals with a choice of Western, Asian, and Indian dishes**
- **Salads, fresh bread rolls, and more substantial entrees**
- **Rotating desserts and fruit plates**
- **A variety of soft drinks, juices, and complimentary hot beverages**

---

## CloudSaver (Economy Class)

**Overview:**  
CloudSaver menus focus on satisfying, flavorful meals inspired by international tastes and comfort food classics.

**Highlights:**
- **Tasty, balanced meals with a selection of meat, vegetarian, and regional options**
- **Seasonal accompaniments such as salads or yogurts**
- **Choice of two or more main courses per flight**
- **Light dessert and fresh fruit**
- **Wide selection of non-alcoholic drinks, tea, and coffee**

---

### Special Meal Requests

For all classes, a wide range of special meal requests (Vegan, Jain, Gluten-Free, Kosher, Child-friendly, Diabetic-friendly, and more) is available to pre-order when booking or through "Manage My Flight."

---

*Menus are refreshed quarterly and may feature regional specialties based on flight route and destination. For a preview of onboard offerings for your route, please visit [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com) or the CloudWay 24 app.*

- **Wide selection of non-alcoholic drinks, tea, and coffee**
Special Meal Requests

For all classes, a wide range of special meal requests (Vegan, Jain, Gluten-Free, Kosher, Child-friendly, Diabetic-friendly, and more) is available to pre-order when booking or through "Manage My Flight."

*Menus are refreshed quarterly and may feature regional specialties based on flight route and destination. For a preview of onboard offerings for your route, please visit [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com) or the CloudWay 24 app.*

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 â€“ Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy

## **Introduction**
At CloudWay 24, the safety, punctuality, and well-being of our staff are top priorities. This cab policy outlines the official guidelines for ground transportation arrangements for our **Pilots** and **Cabin Crew** members to and from designated airports and accommodations.

---

## **Eligibility**
- **Pilots**: All full-time and contract cockpit crew operating CloudWay 24 flights.
- **Cabin Crew**: All active CloudLux, CloudElite, CloudComfort, and CloudSaver in-flight crew members rostered on duty.

---

## **Cab Coverage**
- **Home Pick-Up/Drop-Off**:  
  Crew residing within a **25 km radius** of the hub airport (Mumbai, Delhi, Bengaluru) are eligible for home pick-up and drop-off.
- **Hotel/Airport Transfers**:  
  For layover flights or overnight stops, hotel-to-airport and airport-to-hotel cab arrangements are provided.
- **Scheduled Flights Only**:  
  This policy applies only when crew are reporting for or concluding a scheduled CloudWay 24 flight duty.

---

## **Cab Booking Process**
1. **Automatic Scheduling**:  
   Cabs are automatically scheduled based on the published crew roster.
2. **Self-Booking (Special Cases)**:  
   If auto-scheduling fails, crew may book a cab using the approved CloudWay 24 Staff App or by contacting Crew Logistics at least 6 hours prior to pick-up.
3. **Confirmation**:  
   Crew members will receive SMS/app notifications with cab details two hours before pick-up.

---

## **Cab Types**
- **Premium sedans** for pilots.
- **Comfort sedans or MPVs** for cabin crew (sharing with a maximum of 3 crew per cab as per roster compatibility).
- All cabs are **company-contracted with verified drivers**.

---

## **Safety & Conduct**
- 24/7 availability of cabs for both day and night shifts.
- GPS tracking enabled in all cabs.
- Only authorized personnel allowed in staff cabs.
- Crew must wear airline ID while in transit.

---

## **Payment & Reimbursement**
- All authorized cab rides are **fully paid by the company**. No cash exchange required.
- Unauthorized personal deviations or additional stops are not covered and will require out-of-pocket payment.

---

## **Emergency Helpline**
- Dedicated Crew Cab Helpline: **+91-XXXX-24CAB**
- App-based "SOS" button for immediate assistance.

---

## **Non-Compliance**
- Misuse or unauthorized use may lead to disciplinary action as per CloudWay 24 HR policy.

---

## **Policy Review**
- This policy is reviewed annually and subject to revision based on operational requirements.

---

**For any clarifications, contact Crew Logistics or refer to the Staff Portal at [CloudWay24.com/crew](https://cloudway24.com/crew).**

# CloudWay 24 Co-brand Credit Cards: Earn SkyPoints Faster!

### Introducing CloudWay 24 Co-brand Credit Cards

Unlock the best way to travel and reward yourself with SkyPoints! Our exclusive co-brand credit cards, in partnership with leading banks, allow you to accelerate your SkyPoints earnings every time you spend.

---

## **SkyPoints Earning Structure**

- **10X SkyPoints**  
  Earn 10 times the SkyPoints when you book CloudWay 24 flights using your co-brand credit card on [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com) or our official app.

- **4% SkyPoints**  
  Earn 4% back in SkyPoints on spending for other airlines and hotel bookings, worldwide.

- **2% SkyPoints**  
  Earn 2% back in SkyPoints on all other spendsâ€”retail, dining, shopping, utilities, and more.

---

## **Card Benefits at a Glance**

- **Accelerated SkyPoints Earning**  
  Supercharge your journey to free flights, upgrades, and exclusive rewards.
- **Seamless Integration**  
  Automatically earn SkyPointsâ€”no additional steps required.
- **Redemption Flexibility**  
  Use SkyPoints for flights, upgrades, partner rewards, and more through the SkyPoints 24 program.
- **Travel Perks**  
  Get priority check-in, complimentary lounge access, and more (benefits may vary by card variant).

---

## **How to Apply?**

1. Visit [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com) or your preferred bank website.
2. Choose the "CloudWay 24 Co-brand Credit Card."
3. Fill in the application form and provide necessary documents.
4. Start earning SkyPoints as soon as your card is activated!

---

> **Tip:** Always use your CloudWay 24 co-brand card for booking flights directly with CloudWay 24 to maximize SkyPoints!

**Terms & Conditions apply. Point rates and benefits are subject to change as per the issuing bankâ€™s and CloudWay 24â€™s policy.**

markdown_content:
# Flying with Children on CloudWay 24

Traveling with young passengers? At **CloudWay 24**, we strive to make your journey as seamless and comfortable as possible for families and children of all ages. Hereâ€™s everything you need to know about flying with children on our network.

---

## Pre-flight Preparation

- **Booking for Children**
  - Children under 2 years: Can travel as infants on lap or with a booked seat (additional charges may apply).
  - Children aged 2â€“12 years: Require their own seat and are eligible for child fares.
  - Unaccompanied Minors: Special handling and escort services available for children aged 5â€“12 flying alone. Request while booking.

- **Special Requests**
  - **Bassinet**: Request for infants (subject to availability and aircraft type).
  - **Child Meals**: Pre-book child-friendly meals at least 24 hours before departure via â€œManage My Flight.â€
  - **Seating Preferences**: Request seats together for families to ensure peace of mind.

---

## At the Airport

- **Priority Check-In**
  - Dedicated family counters at Mumbai, Delhi, and Bengaluru hubs.
- **Family Boarding**
  - Priority and early boarding for families with children.
- **Stroller Assistance**
  - Use your stroller at the airport up to the boarding gate. It will be delivered at the aircraft door upon arrival (where feasible).
- **Security Assistance**
  - Friendly staff available to help expedite and simplify the security process for families.

---

## Onboard Comfort

- **In-Flight Entertainment**
  - Kidsâ€™ movies, cartoons, and interactive games in all cabins.
  - Kid-safe headphones on request.
- **Amenities**
  - Infant seat belts and baby cots (in specific rows).
  - Activity kits and soft toys for young flyers (CloudSaver and above).
- **Facilities**
  - Changing tables in restrooms.
  - Warming facilities for milk and baby food.

---

## Child-Friendly Meals

- **Pre-Order**:
  - Reserve child meals (vegetarian and non-vegetarian) when booking or via â€œManage My Flight.â€
- **Special Dietary Needs**:
  - Contact our customer care for allergies or specific requirements.

---

## Family Travel Tips

- Arrive early for a stress-free check-in.
- Carry necessary documents for infants (birth certificate or passport).
- Pack essential items (diapers, wipes, snacks, favorite toys) in your cabin bag.
- Notify staff of any special needs.

---

## Extra Services & Support

- **SkyPoints 24 Family Pooling**:
  - Earn and pool miles across your family for faster rewards.
- **Lounge Access**:
  - Complimentary lounge access in CloudLux and CloudElite classes, with play areas at select hubs.

---

## Need More Help?

Visit our [website](https://CloudWay24.com) or mobile app (CloudWay24) for more details, or contact our 24x7 support team for personalized assistance on your family travel plans.

---

**CloudWay 24**  
*"Seamless Skies, Global Reachâ€”for the whole family."*

  - Use your stroller at the airport up to the boarding gate. It will be delivered at the aircraft door upon arrival (where feasible).

  - Friendly staff available to help expedite and simplify the security process for families.

- **In-Flight Entertainment**
  - Kidsâ€™ movies, cartoons, and interactive games in all cabins.

  - Changing tables in restrooms.

- **Pre-Order**:

- **Special Dietary Needs**:
  - Contact our customer care for allergies or specific requirements.
Family Travel Tips

- Arrive early for a stress-free check-in.
- Carry necessary documents for infants (birth certificate or passport).
- Pack essential items (diapers, wipes, snacks, favorite toys) in your cabin bag.
- Notify staff of any special needs.
Extra Services & Support

- **SkyPoints 24 Family Pooling**:
  - Earn and pool miles across your family for faster rewards.
- **Lounge Access**:
  - Complimentary lounge access in CloudLux and CloudElite classes, with play areas at select hubs.
Need More Help?
Visit our [website](https://CloudWay24.com) or mobile app (CloudWay24) for more details, or contact our 24x7 support team for personalized assistance on your family travel plans.

# Airbus A350 â€“ CloudWay 24 Fleet Overview

## Aircraft Overview
The **Airbus A350** is a next-generation, long-haul wide-body aircraft known for its advanced aerodynamics, fuel efficiency, and passenger comfort. Operated by CloudWay 24 on major intercontinental routes, the A350 delivers a premium flying experience across all cabin classes.

- **Aircraft Manufacturer:** Airbus
- **Aircraft Model:** A350-900
- **Total Seating Capacity:** 320 passengers

---

## Class-wise Seating Capacity & Cabin Features

### 1. **CloudLux (First Class)**
- **Seats:** 8
- **Configuration:** 1-2-1
- **Key Features:**
  - Fully enclosed private suites
  - Lie-flat beds with luxury bedding
  - Personal 21â€ HD touchscreen entertainment system
  - Gourmet on-demand dining, exclusive menu
  - Direct aisle access
  - Dedicated First Class lounge access
  - Personalized service with dedicated crew
  - Amenity kit by luxury brand

### 2. **CloudElite (Business Class)**
- **Seats:** 42
- **Configuration:** 1-2-1
- **Key Features:**
  - Lie-flat beds (78â€ pitch)
  - All seats with direct aisle access
  - 18â€ personal HD entertainment screen
  - Multi-course meals, fine wines & beverages
  - Ambient mood lighting
  - Noise-cancelling headphones
  - Enhanced storage space & privacy dividers
  - Priority check-in & boarding
  - Lounge access

### 3. **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)**
- **Seats:** 32
- **Configuration:** 2-4-2
- **Key Features:**
  - Wider seats with extra legroom (38â€ pitch)
  - Enhanced recline and footrests
  - 13â€ personal HD screen
  - Welcome drink & upgraded meal options
  - Power outlets & USB ports at every seat
  - Dedicated cabin crew

### 4. **CloudSaver (Economy Class)**
- **Seats:** 238
- **Configuration:** 3-3-3
- **Key Features:**
  - Ergonomically designed seats
  - 32â€ seat pitch, adjustable headrests
  - 11â€ personal touchscreen display
  - Complimentary meals & beverages
  - USB charging ports
  - In-flight WiFi (paid service)
  - Family seating options

---

## Additional Features (All Cabins)
- **Advanced air filtration system (HEPA)**
- **High ceilings and larger windows for natural lighting**
- **Customizable mood lighting for reduced jet-lag**
- **Spacious, modern lavatories**
- **Quietest cabin in its class**

---

## About CloudWay 24â€™s A350 Experience
CloudWay 24â€™s Airbus A350 promises a soothing, high-tech environment designed for comfort, productivity, and relaxation â€“ whether youâ€™re flying CloudLux or CloudSaver.

> â€œSeamless Skies, Global Reach.â€

---

filename: Check Your Visa and Passport Requirements.md
markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24: Visa and Passport Requirements Guide

## Check Your Visa and Passport Requirements
Before booking your CloudWay 24 flight, ensure that you meet all entry requirements for your destination. Below is a quick-reference guide for visa and passport requirements for travelers from India to countries in **Europe**, **Western**, and **Middle East** regions.

---

## General Requirements

- **Passport Validity:** Minimum 6 months validity from your date of arrival in most international destinations.
- **Blank Pages:** At least 2 blank pages recommended for visa/stamping.
- **Return Ticket:** Proof of onward/return travel may be required.
- **Travel Insurance:** Mandatory for Schengen (Europe) and recommended for others.

---

## Europe (Schengen Zone & Others)

| Country           | Passport Validity          | Visa Required (Indian Citizens) | Notes                                      |
|-------------------|---------------------------|---------------------------------|--------------------------------------------|
| **Schengen Zone** | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              | Covers most of Western/Central Europe      |
| France            | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Germany           | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Netherlands       | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Spain             | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Italy             | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Switzerland       | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Greece            | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Austria           | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Belgium           | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Sweden            | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Norway            | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| **UK**            | 6 months                  | Yes, UK Visa                    | Separate from Schengen                     |
| **Ireland**       | 6 months                  | Yes, Ireland Visa               | Separate from Schengen                     |
| **Russia**        | 6 months                  | Yes, Russian Visa               | Invitation letter needed for some purposes |
| **Turkey**        | 6 months                  | Yes, e-Visa/Sticker Visa        | e-Visa for tourism/business                |
| **Ukraine**       | 6 months                  | Yes, e-Visa/Sticker Visa        |                                            |

---

## Western Europe (Highlights)

> Most Western Europe countries are under the Schengen Zone.  
> United Kingdom and Ireland have separate visa policies.

---

## Middle East Countries

| Country        | Passport Validity     | Visa Required (Indian Citizens)      | Notes                                               |
|----------------|----------------------|--------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------|
| UAE (Dubai)    | 6 months             | Yes, eVisa/Sticker Visa              | Pre-arranged visa, On-arrival for some categories   |
| Saudi Arabia   | 6 months             | Yes, eVisa/Sticker Visa              | eVisa for tourism, other purposes need prior visa   |
| Qatar          | 6 months             | Yes, eVisa/Sticker Visa              | On-arrival for Indians with valid US/UK/Schengen    |
| Oman           | 6 months             | Yes, eVisa                          | On-arrival possible for select travelers            |
| Kuwait         | 6 months             | Yes, eVisa                          |                                                     |
| Bahrain        | 6 months             | Yes, eVisa/On-Arrival               |                                                     |
| Israel         | 6 months             | Yes, Sticker Visa                    | Apply in advance                                    |
| Jordan         | 6 months             | Yes, Visa on Arrival (Indian tourists)|                                                     |
| Iran           | 6 months             | Yes, Visa on Arrival (at some airports) | Recommend pre-arranged Visa                         |

---

## How to Check Your Requirements

1. Visit **CloudWay24.com** or use the CloudWay24 App.
2. Go to "Plan My Flight" â€“ select your **route** and **dates**.
3. Click on "Visa & Passport Info" on the booking page.
4. Review requirements for your nationality, transit rules, and special advisories.

---

### Disclaimer
- Visa and entry rules change frequently.  
- Always verify the latest requirements on the [destination embassy/consulate website](https://www.timaticweb.com/) or with your travel agent before departure.

---

**Safe travels with CloudWay 24!**

How to Check Your Requirements

markdown_content:
# CloudWay 24 Special Baggage Policy

CloudWay 24 offers customized handling and allowances for special baggage items across all travel classes. Passengers are encouraged to review class-wise entitlements and guidelines for items such as sports equipment, musical instruments, hunting/sport rifles, and ammunition.

---

## 1. Eligible Special Baggage Categories

- **Sports Equipment**
  - Golf bags, skis, snowboards, bicycles, surfboards, cricket kits, etc.
- **Musical Instruments**
  - Guitars, violins, cellos, musical keyboards, etc.
- **Hunting & Sport Rifles**
  - Permitted only with valid licenses and prior airline approval.
- **Ammunition**
  - Only as checked baggage, under strict regulatory compliance.

---

## 2. Class-wise Special Baggage Allowance

| Cabin Class     | Free Special Baggage Allowance  | Additional Fees                | Priority Handling |
|-----------------|-------------------------------|-------------------------------|------------------|
| **CloudLux (First Class)**    | 2 special items included            | Additional items: Standard excess baggage fee | Yes|
| **CloudElite (Business Class)** | 1 special item included             | Additional items: Standard excess baggage fee | Yes|
| **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)** | No free inclusion                   | All items: Standard excess baggage fee         | No |
| **CloudSaver (Economy)**  | No free inclusion                   | All items: Standard excess baggage fee         | No |

> **Note:** Size and weight limits apply. Items above permitted weight/size may attract oversize/overweight charges.

---

## 3. Packing & Handling Guidelines

### Sports Equipment
- Should be securely packed and labeled.
- Oversized items (e.g. bicycles, surfboards) require advance notice.
- Fragile items: Passenger advised to insure against damage.

### Musical Instruments
- Small instruments (up to 115 cm/45 in and 7kg): Allowed as cabin baggage (subject to space and safety).
- Larger instruments: Must be checked-in; special packing recommended; advance notification required.
- For extra protection, a paid seat may be booked for larger valuable instruments (subject to availability).

### Hunting & Sport Rifles, Ammunition
- **Only permitted as checked baggage with:**
  - Valid firearm license(s) and documentation.
  - Prior notification (at least 72 hours before departure).
  - Approval at origin and destination as per local and international regulations.
- **Packing:** Unloaded, dismantled if possible, in rigid locked cases.
- **Ammunition:** Limited to 5 kg per passenger, packed separately from firearms, in manufacturerâ€™s packaging.

---

## 4. Advance Arrangement & Approval

- **Advance notification is mandatory** for all firearms, ammunition, and oversized/fragile items.
- Submit requests via â€œManage My Flightâ€ or contact CloudWay 24 Customer Service.
- Confirmation required before travel.

---

## 5. Fees and Charges

- **Refer to the [CloudWay 24 Baggage Calculator](https://cloudway24.com/baggage) for specific rates.**
- Fees vary by route, item size/weight, and membership tier (SkyPoints 24 members may get fee waivers).

---

## 6. Exclusions and Restrictions

- No carriage of explosive or incendiary items.
- Restrictions applied for travel to/from certain destinations due to local laws.
- Airline reserves the right to refuse any special baggage not meeting safety, security, or compliance requirements.

---

**For any questions or to pre-arrange your special baggage:**
- Visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com)
- Use the CloudWay 24 App (iOS/Android)
- Or contact our 24x7 Customer Support

---

_CloudWay 24 â€“ Seamless Skies, Global Reach._
